recipe.title: Fennel and Olive Relish
ingredients: 2 fennel bulbs with fronds (sometimes labeled "anise"; 1 1/2 lb total)
1/2 teaspoon finely grated fresh orange zest
instructions: Cut stalks from fennel bulbs, then chop enough fronds to measure 1/4 cup. Discard remaining fronds and stalks. Quarter bulbs, then finely chop in a food processor. Transfer to a bowl.
Stir in remaining ingredients. Let stand 1 hour for flavors to meld. Serve at room temperature.
